h1_header_1: The moment requires new solutions: IBTeC your best partnership
h1_header_2: The moment requires new solutions: IBTeC your best partnership
home_section_nucleo_text: Since its creation in 1972, IBTeC has sought to contribute to the development of the leather-footwear sector through research, information, technical consultancy and the development of tests and continually advance in the market, including suitability for export.
home_section_video_text: Since its creation in 1972, IBTeC has sought to contribute to the development of the leather-footwear sector through research, information, technical consultancy and the development of tests and trials in specialized laboratories so that companies can continually qualify and advance in the market, including suitability for export.
home_section_video_title: Technology at the service of industry
p_header: For over 50 years in the market, the Institute offers technological services, innovation and sustainability
